descriptions.title: Intel Core i9 14900K 14th Gen Raptor Lake Processor
descriptions.details: The Intel Core i9 14900K 14th Gen Processor boosts your productivity, gaming, and multimedia production. This 14th-generation desktop CPU, built with the Intel 7 technology, provides increased power efficiency while fitting the LGA 1700 socket. The Core i9-14900K has an improved Hybrid Core Architecture that powers demanding apps and games with eight 3.2 GHz Performance-cores while the 16 low-voltage Efficient-cores perform background activities for seamless multitasking. The built-in Intel Thread Director guarantees that the two function flawlessly together by dynamically and intelligently assigning tasks to the correct core at the right time. using 36MB of cache and a Turbo Boost Max 3.20 frequency of 6.00 GHz that can be increased using Thermal Velocity Boost and Adaptive Boost technologies, this CPU is designed to handle nearly any job. This CPU can be overclocked for even better performance. The Core i9-14900K also supports PCI Express 5.0 and up to 192GB of dual-channel DDR5 ECC memory at 5600 MHz.

descriptions.title: Hybrid Core Design
descriptions.details: The Intel Core i9 14900K 14th Gen Processor Performance cores offer the speed to handle high-end games and demanding programs, while the processor's Efficient-cores manage low-priority and background chores like streaming video, playing music, and decoding media.

descriptions.title: Intel Thread Director
descriptions.details: The Intel Thread Director is incorporated into the CPU cores and collaborates with the operating system to guarantee that each of the 32 threads is allocated to the correct core at the proper time.

descriptions.title: PCIe 4.0 & 5.0
descriptions.details: This Intel Core i9 14900K 14th Gen Processor provides up to four PCIe 4.0 and sixteen PCIe 5.0 lanes, for a total of 20 lanes for excellent data throughput with compatible devices.

descriptions.title: Thermal Velocity Boost
descriptions.details: When thermal headroom and a turbo power budget are available, Intel Thermal Velocity Boost (TVB) unlocks more CPU performance by increasing the maximum frequency to 6 GHz. It is appropriate for burst workloads with unexpected increases in CPU consumption, delivering a brief speed boost to assist minimize slowdowns.

descriptions.title: Adaptive Boost
descriptions.details: This Intel Core i9 14900K Processor has Intel Adaptive Boost Technology, which boosts the all-core turbo frequency beyond prior Turbo Boost clock rates when Thermal Velocity Boost criteria are not satisfied. Many games benefit from multi-threaded applications that scale with numerous cores. It can also be useful in multitasking scenarios, such as while gaming, streaming, and talking through many programs at the same time.

descriptions.title: Integrated Graphics
descriptions.details: The Intel Core i9 14900K 14th Gen Processor is powered by Intel Xe architecture and offers fast, rich 3D performance for high-quality visuals with support for one 7680 x 4320 resolution 8K monitor or up to four 3840 x 2160 resolution 4K displays with high dynamic range.

descriptions.title: Gaussian & Neural Accelerator 3.0
descriptions.details: During video conversations, the Intel Core i9 14900K 14th Gen Raptor Lake Processor with Gaussian and Neural Accelerator 3.0 (GNA) technology assists with noise suppression while improving background blurring.

product_name: Intel 13th Gen Core i3-13100 Raptor Lake Processor

descriptions.title: Intel 13th Gen Core i3-13100 Raptor Lake Processor
descriptions.details: The Intel 13th Gen Core i3-13100 Raptor Lake Processor is a quad-core, eight-thread processor with a base clock speed of 3.40 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 4.50 GHz. It features 12 MB of L3 cache and is compatible with the LGA 1700 socket. It is a part of Intel's 13th generation of processors built on the Raptor Lake architecture. It is designed for use in desktops and workstations. The Intel Core i3-13100 is compatible with LGA 1700 socket motherboards with the Intel 600 or 700 series chipset. The Core i3-13100 features integrated Intel UHD 730 Graphics. It comes with support for PCI Express 5.0 and dual-channel DDR5 memory at 4800 MHz, making it ideal for office applications.

descriptions.title: Supports DDR4 and DDR5
descriptions.details: The Intel 13th Gen Core i3-13100 Raptor Lake Processor supports up to 128 GB of memory, dependent on the type of memory used. It supports both DDR5 and DDR4 memory types, with speeds of up to 4800 MT/s and 3200 MT/s respectively. The processor supports a maximum of 2 memory channels and has a maximum memory bandwidth of 76.8 GB/s. This means that the processor can quickly access and transfer data stored in the memory, which can improve overall system performance.

descriptions.title: PCIe 4.0 & 5.0
descriptions.details: The Intel Core i3-13100 supports PCI Express Revision 5.0 and 4.0. PCI Express (PCIe) is a high-speed interface standard for connecting peripheral devices to a computer. The processor supports a maximum of 20 PCI Express lanes, which can be configured in a variety of ways. The processor supports up to 1x16+4 or 2x8+4 configurations, which means it can support one x16 lane and four x1 lanes or two x8 lanes and four x1 lanes. These configurations allow for flexible usage of different peripheral devices, such as graphics cards, network cards, and solid-state drives.

descriptions.title: Integrated Graphics
descriptions.details: The Intel Core i3-13100 Processor comes with integrated Intel UHD 730 Graphics. This integrated GPU allows for high-quality visuals, with support for 8K resolution (7680 x 4320) on a single monitor, or up to four 4K resolution (3840 x 2160) displays. The UHD 730 Graphics is suitable for basic graphic needs like video playback, casual gaming, or basic photo editing. However, for heavy gaming, video editing or 3D rendering, you'll need a discrete graphics card.

descriptions.title: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X Processor
descriptions.details: The AMD Ryzen 9 7950X is a 16-core CPU featuring Zen4 micro-architecture. It reportedly features two Durango CCDs with 16 cores codenamed âPersephoneâ. descriptions.title: Ryzen 7000 Series, the new generation of AMD CPU
descriptions.details: The Ryzen 7000 is AMD's first 5nm x86 CPU for desktop PCs, however, it doesn't have more cores than earlier-generation versions. But with the new Zen 4 microarchitecture, rates may reach 5.7 GHz, an astounding 800 MHz boost over the previous generation, and up to 13% more IPC. As a consequence, single-threaded performance is up 29% compared to the previous-generation CPUs. As for threaded workloads, AMD claims up to 45% greater performance in applications with higher performance requirements.

descriptions.title: Latest AMD Socket AM5
descriptions.details: It's time for AMD to switch to the brand-new AM5 platform with a new LGA1718 socket because the AM4 platform has been around for more than five years. In contrast to the previous PGA socket, the LGA socket will have pins rather than the CPU itself. Due to the opportunity, it offers for several new technologies, the AM5 platform will be a breath of fresh air. Expect increased overclocking headroom, additional ports, a larger PPT maximum (230W vs. 142W), and more.

descriptions.title: Support for DDR5 RAM and PCIe 5.0
descriptions.details: It's time to gradually phase out DDR4 in favor of DDR5, which offers the possibility of higher clock rates, lower power consumption, and lower latency. DDR4 opened the way for faster memory with very low latency. All AM5 motherboard versions will support PCIe 5.0. The unlocked multiplier on the Ryzen 9 7900X is fully adjustable, making it much easier to tune in any overclocking frequency.

descriptions.title: Precision Boost 2
descriptions.details: AMD Ryzen processors monitor the system's energy consumption, temperatures, and other factors to automatically raise clock speeds, allowing applications to perform faster.

descriptions.title: Precision Boost Overdrive
descriptions.details: Precision Boost Overdrive technology takes advantage of your compatible motherboard's design to boost clock speeds higher and for longer periods of time. It also allows you overclock the processor at the touch of a button.

descriptions.title: AMD StoreMI Technology
descriptions.details: AMD StoreMI technology helps to improve load times and overall system performance by combining solid-state drives and mechanical hard drives into a single hybrid storage drive. Frequently used files and programs are cached onto the fast SSD while other files are stored on the high-capacity HDD.

descriptions.title: AMD Ryzen VR Ready Premium
descriptions.details: Ryzen VR Ready Premium processors are designed to meet or exceed the recommended specifications from the top HMD manufacturers, including Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, and Windows Mixed Reality for smooth performance.

descriptions.title: Personalized Performance

descriptions.title: System Monitoring
descriptions.details: Monitor your system in real-time using the AMD Ryzen Master Utility, which features a histogram of per-core clock rates and temperature, including average and peak readings.

Additionally, you may discover here the processor's single-core and multi-core clock frequencies. The processor's speed is significantly influenced by the number of CPU cores. The AMD Ryzen 7 7700X contains integrated graphics, often known as iGPU. Sitting on the processor's die, the iGPU uses the system's main memory as graphics memory. APU is another name for an integrated graphics processor (Accelerated Processing Unit).

descriptions.title: Memory, PCIe & Thermal Management
descriptions.details: The amount and kind of memory have a significant impact on the processor's speed. The memory bandwidth, which is measured in gigabytes per second, relies on several variables. The cooling system required to keep the processor cool enough is specified by the Thermal Design Power or TDP. The TDP often only provides a general notion of a CPU's actual usage. The AMD Ryzen 9 7900X Processor comes with a 03 years warranty (No Warranty for Fan or Cooler).

descriptions.title: ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI 13th Gen ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI Motherboard features LGA 1700 socket and Z790 chipset which supports Intel Socket LGA1700 for 13th Gen Intel Core & 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron Processors. This motherboard comes with 4 x DIMM that supports DDR5 Dual-Channel RAM up to 128GB of memory with speeds up to 7200 MHz when overclocked. This provides you with increased multitasking and rendering capabilities. It comes with 5x M.2 PCIe and four SATA III storage interfaces allow you to combine an array of storage drives to build a massive gaming library. It also has a single PCIe 5.0 x16 slot that supports resource-intensive graphics cards, while two PCIe 4.0 x16 (in x4 mode) and one PCIe 3.0 x1 slots support a variety of utility cards. Several USB 2.0, 3.2 Gen 1, Gen 2, and Gen 2x2 interfaces are accessible via the back panel and internal headers, providing ample support for peripherals such as mice, keyboards, and controllers as well as resource-demanding devices such as external drives. Bluetooth 5.2 technology can be used by wireless devices to provide a reliable cable-free experience. Use Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) to connect to your wireless network, or the integrated 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet port if you prefer a wired connection.

descriptions.title: AI Overclocking
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI can boost performance with automatic AI overclocking and cooling, enhancing your games and productivity without sacrificing thermal capabilities. AI noise cancellation is an audio-focused utility that reduces background noise, allowing others to hear you more clearly when playing team-based games or delivering presentations remotely. GameFirst VI is an artificial intelligence networking tool that prioritizes and optimizes your network connection for smoother online gameplay, which is essential for competitive online titles.

descriptions.title: Enhanced Power Solution
descriptions.details: ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI delivers stable power throughout the entire motherboard, maintaining electrical volume whether performing simple tasks or operating at full power during resource-demanding processes, thanks to 16+1 70A power stages with ProCool II connectors, alloy chokes, and durable capacitors.

descriptions.title: Comprehensive Cooling
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI motherboard incorporates a large VRM heatsink for capacitors and chokes, as well as integrated double-sided M.2 heat sinks and a unique PCH fan-less heatsink, to ensure your system remains cool under heavy loads, delivering better thermal performance while preventing throttling. Fan expert 4 software and hybrid fan headers control fans and liquid pump elements for enhanced cooling that can be customized.

descriptions.title: ROG SupremeFX 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio
descriptions.details: Immerse yourself in your favorite games with the help of high-fidelity audio powered by the Savitech SV3H712 amplifier and ROG SupremeFX 7.1-channel ALC4080 codec. Premium capacitors and audio jacks with gold plating enhance audio conductivity for a dependable signal and reduce static and other interference.

descriptions.title: Leading Connectivity
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI ATX Motherboard provides reliable connectivity for your peripherals between the internal headers and the backplate. Webcams, microphones, and external storage drives can transfer data at speeds of up to 5 and 10 Gb/s through USB-A and USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 and Gen 2 ports, respectively. For devices that require a lot of resources, like storage arrays and audio interfaces, a USB-C 3.2 Gen 2x2 port offers up to 20 Gb/s data transfer speed. In addition to facilitating data transfer, a front panel USB-C 3.2 Gen 2x2 port provides up to 30W Power Delivery to charge and support peripherals that require a lot of resources. With an internal Thunderbolt 4 header, you can increase your connectivity and take advantage of high-speed connectivity that supports quick transfer rates and Power Delivery technologies.

descriptions.title: Asus ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI DDR5 ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI DDR5 14th, 13th & 12th Gen ATX Motherboard is a top-of-the-line motherboard designed for gamers and enthusiasts looking to build a high-performance PC. It is equipped with an Intel LGA 1700 socket, making it ready for use with 13th-generation Intel Core and 12th-generation Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron processors. The Asus ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI motherboard features a robust power solution with 16 + 1 power stages rated for 80A, dual ProCool II power connectors, high-quality alloy chokes, and durable capacitors, providing stable power to support the latest multicore processors. It also boasts optimized VRM thermals with massive heat sinks connected by an L-shaped heat pipe, high-conductivity thermal pads, and an integrated I/O shroud. With four PCIe 4.0 M.2 slots all with heatsinks, including the tallest having a combo sink extension and backplate for additional cooling, the motherboard provides extensive M.2 support. Additionally, it offers abundant connectivity with a USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C rear I/O port and additional front panel connector, seven USB 3.2 Gen 2 and Gen 1 ports, PCIe 5.0 x16 SafeSlot, HDMI 2.1, and DisplayPort 1.4. The Asus ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI 14th Gen Motherboard is equipped with built-in WiFi 6E (802.11ax) and 2.5Gb Intel Ethernet with ASUS LANGuard for high-performance networking. It also features intelligent control with ASUS-exclusive AI overclocking, AI II cooling, AI networking, and bi-directional AI noise cancellation to simplify setup and improve performance.

descriptions.title: Asus ROG X570 Crosshair VIII Hero WI-FI ATX AM4 Motherboard
descriptions.details: ROG Crosshair VIII Hero comes equipped with an optimized power-design layout and all the cooling headers you need to handle the prodigious power of the latest AMD Ryzen processors without performance-zapping thermal throttling.Ã¢â¬â¹ ROG gives you powerful tools that make optimizing your system fast and easy. For those who relish fine-grained control, the UEFI BIOS has a wealth of advanced options organized into intuitive categories that provide the ability to tweak every aspect of your systemÃ¢â¬â¹. Conventional motherboards use single-ended sensing tapped from a location that isn't ideal, leading to a large disparity between the actual voltage fed to the CPU and the value reported to the software. The Hero features a differential sensing circuit that simplifies overclocking and tuning by allowing you to track voltages more accurately. The renowned ROG UEFI (BIOS) provides everything you need to configure, tweak, and tune your rig. It offers intelligently simplified options for newcomers to PC DIY, as well as comprehensive features for seasoned veterans. AI Suite 3's dashboard-style control panel lets you fine-tune almost every aspect of your system. Get the best balance between performance, cooling, stability, and efficiency via one simple and intuitive interface.Ã¢â¬â¹ The TurboV Processing Unit (TPU) is an intelligent onboard micro-controller that provides an array of system-tuning features, including the ability to fine-tune voltages, monitor system stats and adjust overclocking parameters. ROG Crosshair VIII Hero offers advanced connectivity to ensure seamless gaming experiences. With the latest ultrafast networking, including Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and dual Ethernet with one 2.5G port, ROG Crosshair VIII Hero removes all bottlenecks for online and LAN play, minimizing lag and providing an overall smoother experience. Additionally, the M.2 supports AMD StoreMI technology to maximize the speed of your SSD for faster load times, and SupremeFX onboard audio provides superb sound while saving a PCIe slot.Ã¢â¬â¹ ROG provides a range of intuitive software that enables easy control of your advanced gaming hardware and ensures seamless component compatibility. From RGB lighting, networking, and audio to storage optimization and more, ROG gives you the power to personalize your system just the way you want.Ã¢â¬â¹ ROG Crosshair VIII Hero offers advanced connectivity to ensure seamless gaming experiences. With the latest ultrafast networking, including Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and dual Ethernet with one 2.5G port, ROG Crosshair VIII Hero removes all bottlenecks for online and LAN play, minimizing lag and providing an overall smoother experience. Additionally, the M.2 supports AMD StoreMI technology to maximize the speed of your SSD for faster load times, and SupremeFX onboard audio provides superb sound while saving a PCIe slot.Ã¢â¬â¹ Gear up with ROG components, from graphics and monitors to mice and keyboards, and up your game with complementary aesthetics, control, and compatibility. The ROG ecosystem is more extensive than any competing brand, so enjoy greater choice as your system expands. GameFirst V is a ROG-exclusive tool that optimizes network traffic and your connection for faster, lag-free online gaming. Select the best Wi-Fi channel for maximum stability and minimum interference, team your gateways, and keep tabs on bandwidth-hogging apps, all from an intuitive interface that enables easy, on-the-fly adjustments. Armoury Crate is a new software utility designed to give you centralized control of supported ROG gaming products. From a single intuitive interface, Armoury Crate lets you easily customize RGB lighting and effects for every compatible device in your arsenal and synchronize them with Aura Sync for uniÃ¯Â¬ï¿½ed system lighting effects. The software also provides control of settings for a select and growing number of ROG products, including keyboard and mouse preferences as well as laptop overclocking and fan speeds, making it easier to tune the look and feel of your system. Armoury Crate even features dedicated product registration and ROG news areas to help you stay in touch with the ROG gaming community.

descriptions.title: Asus ROG STRIX Z690-E GAMING WIFI Intel 12th Gen ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: The Asus ROG STRIX Z690-E GAMING WIFI Motherboard features Intel LGA 1700 socket Ready for 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron Processors. Asus Prime series motherboards are expertly engineered to unleash the full potential of 12th Generation Intel processors. It comes with an enhanced power solution. 16+1 power stages with 8+8 ProCool II power connectors, high-quality alloy chokes, and durable capacitors to support multi-core processors. It features an Integrated I/O cover and VRM heatsinks with high conductivity thermal pad, L-shaped Heatpipe, four onboard M.2 heatsinks, and M.2 backplate for the M.2_1 slot. It features onboard Intel WiFi 6E (802.11ax) and Intel 2.5 Gb Ethernet with ASUS LANGuard. The Asus Asus ROG STRIX Z690-E GAMING WIFI WIFI is supported with DDR5 memory, PCIe 5.0, Intel 2.5 Gb Ethernet, USB 3.2 Gen2x2 Type-C, front panel USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, Thunderbolt 4 header support, 4 PCIe 4.0 M.2. descriptions.title: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse
descriptions.details: ASUS P707 ROG Spatha X is a Dual-mode RGB Gaming Mouse from ASUS. descriptions.details: This mouse has Dual-mode connectivity lets you play your way. ROG Spatha X utilizes an RF 2.4 GHz connection with high data throughput to ensure your commands are tracked accurately in-game. And once the battery runs out, just hook it up and continue the fight while charging, all without losing responsiveness and performance. A highly tuned 19,000 dpi optical sensor delivers unrivaled accuracy with a 400 IPS speed, and 50G acceleration.

descriptions.title: Up to 12 Programmable Buttons
descriptions.details: The 12 programmable buttons on ROG Spatha X put a myriad of commands in the palm of your hand, with six side buttons arranged to resemble the iconic ROG eye. descriptions.title: Advanced Power Solution
descriptions.details: ROG Spatha X offers phenomenal battery life, giving you up to 67 hours of playtime on a full charge. And if the battery does run low, just 15 minutes of charging via USB-C or the charging dock provides up to 12 hours of intense wireless gaming.

descriptions.title: Exclusive Push-Fit Switch Socket with DPI On-The-Scroll
descriptions.details: Exclusive push-fit switch sockets make it easy to drop in new switches; so you can tailor operating force and feedback to preference, or replace worn or broken switches. A unique DPI On-The-Scroll feature lets you easily adjust mouse sensitivity without accessing software. Just press and hold the DPI button for three seconds and then spin the scroll wheel and click the button again to set and save the sensitivity level. You can also just click the button to cycle through four different DPI levels.

descriptions.title: ROG Paracord and Aura RGB Lighting
descriptions.details: The extremely flexible and lightweight ROG Paracord is designed to minimize snags and maximize movement. The raised port of ROG Spatha X provides space between the cable and tabletop or mousepad surface, minimizing cable drag and noise. ROG Aura RGB lighting is integrated into the logo, the scroll wheel and side buttons of ROG Spatha X. Lighting can be customized with a near-endless spectrum of colors and a range of dynamic effects. In addition, up to five profiles can be stored onboard, so your preferences travel with you.

descriptions.details: Armoury Crate is an enhanced driver-based, peripherals-configuration utility that offers extensive controls. An intuitive UI lets you easily tune ROG Spatha X to suit your gameplay style Ã¢â¬â adjust performance and surface calibration settings, program and map buttons, customize lighting effects, and more. descriptions.title: Apple Mac Mini M2 chip with 8-core Processor, 10-Core GPU, 8GB Memory, 512GB Storage
descriptions.details: The Apple Mac mini is now equipped with Apple's pro-level M2 chip, making it suited for a variety of jobs like editing huge photos and 8K ProRes video as well as more demanding applications like immersive gaming and rich presentations. The Apple M2, which makes use of 2nd-Generation 5nm process technology, merges the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and more into a single system on a chip (SoC). Users will be able to concurrently playback up to two streams of 8K ProRes 422 video at 30 frames per second or up to 12 streams of 4K ProRes 422 video at 30 frames per second, which is an increase of up to 2.4x over the previous generation Mac mini with M1. Filter and function performance in Adobe Photoshop is also boosted up to 50%. This is possible thanks to the M2's faster next-generation CPU and GPU, higher bandwidth memory, and a more powerful media engine for improved performance and power efficiency that includes an advanced thermal system for greater sustained performance. Adding to the Mac mini's power is 8GB of RAM and, thanks to the addition of Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax), wireless networking will operate at up to 2.4 Gb/s. The 10-Core GPU produces images that are crisp and clear, and you can export video to an external monitor using either the built-in HDMI port or the system's Thunderbolt 4 ports, which support native DisplayPort output. With one 6K/60Hz monitor using Thunderbolt 4 and a second 5K/60Hz display using Thunderbolt 4, or a 4K/60Hz display using HDMI, this Mac mini enables up to two simultaneous displays. A 512GB SSD is included in this Mac mini for file storage. There are two Thunderbolt 4 / USB 4 ports, 10 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 2 ports, charging ports, and power ports for external peripherals if you want to add external peripherals. There are still two 5 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports available for connecting additional devices to this machine. For wired networking, a Gigabit Ethernet connector is already there. Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) can be used for wireless access. You can connect more compatible devices, such as keyboards, mice, and headsets, using Bluetooth 5.3 technology. Using a 3.5mm headphone jack, the sound is output. An integrated 150W power supply that uses 100-240 VAC at 50-60 Hz powers Apple's Mac mini.

descriptions.title: iPhone 15 Pro Max 512GB Natural Titanium (Singapore Unofficial)
descriptions.details: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with all-screen OLED technology. It has a resolution of 2796-by-1290-pixel resolution at 460 ppi and ProMotion technology with adjustable refresh rates that can exceed 120Hz. The display has a usual maximum brightness of 1,000 nits, a peak HDR brightness of 1,600 nits, and an amazing peak brightness of 2,000 nits for outdoor use. Dynamic Island, Always-On display, True Tone technology, broad color (P3) support, Haptic Touch, a phenomenal 20,00,000:1 contrast ratio (typical), and a fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating are among the features. It also allows for the display of various languages and characters at the same time. USB 3 and Wi-Fi 6E connection for quicker data transmission and wireless speeds.

descriptions.title: Processor & Storage
descriptions.details: The Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max is powered by the A17 Pro processor, which has a 6-core CPU with 2 performance and 4 efficiency cores, as well as a 16-core Neural Engine. The GPU is a 6-core monster. This model comes with 8GB of RAM and 512GB of internal storage, providing plenty of space for programs, photographs, and movies. Unfortunately, there is no option for expanded storage.

descriptions.title: Camera
descriptions.details: The iPhone 15 Pro Max camera system on the back includes a 48MP Main camera with many sophisticated capabilities, a 12MP Ultra Wide camera with a wide field of view, and a 12MP Telephoto camera with 3x optical zoom in, 2x optical zoom out, and up to 15x digital zoom. These cameras provide a broad range of features, including Night mode, ProRAW compatibility, and 4K video recording at up to 60 frames per second with HDR. The TrueDepth front camera, with 12MP resolution and an f/1.9 aperture, supports features such as Animoji, Memoji, Night mode, and 4K video recording at up to 60 fps with HDR. It complements the rear cameras, providing excellent selfie and video call capabilities.

descriptions.title: Network & Connectivity
descriptions.details: It iPhone 15 Pro Max features a 5G connection (sub-6 GHz), Gigabit LTE, Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.3, and Precision dual-frequency GPS for exact position monitoring. It contains NFC capability with reader mode as well as a USB-C port for charging and data transmission.

descriptions.title: Operating System
descriptions.details: Style it out. Change it out. Stick it up with iOS 17. The iPhone 15 Pro Max includes the most recent software features and advancements from Apple. iOS 17 includes new features to improve the activities you do every day. When you phone or text someone, express yourself like you've never done before. Share information in more convenient ways. Do even more with new iPhone experiences.

descriptions.title: Gigablast your gigabits
descriptions.details: The Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max is the first iPhone to utilize USB 3, allowing for quicker data transfer speeds and pro workflows than ever before. File transfers can be up to 20 times quicker. With the new USBC connector, you can charge your Mac or iPad using the same cable that you use to charge your iPhone 15 Pro Max. Goodbye, cable mess. The all-new WiFi 6E provides up to double the wifi speed. As a result, you may quickly upload and download files. Want to make a buddy in a crowded railway station or a crowded park? Precision Finding is the place to go for Find My Friends. Precision Finding now offers three times the range, thanks to the new, second-generation Ultra Wideband processor. To enable Precision Finding, friends with iPhone 15 or iPhone 15 Pro Max can use Find My to share their location solely with you. It's easy and confidential.

descriptions.title: iPhone 14 Pro Max 256GB Space Black (Singapore)
descriptions.details: The iPhone 14 Pro Max is the latest model of the iPhone series, featuring the latest technology and advanced features that are designed to provide users with a seamless and unparalleled mobile experience. The device is powered by the latest A16 Bionic chip, providing exceptional performance and power efficiency. The 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, with ProMotion technology, delivers an immersive visual experience with incredibly vibrant colors and deep blacks. The device comes equipped with a triple-camera system, including a 48MP main, 12MP ultra-wide, and 12MP telephoto lens, allowing users to capture stunning photos and videos. This iPhone 14 Pro Max has a 256GB internal storage capacity, offering ample space for all your photos, videos, and apps. It has been designed for durability with Ceramic Shield. It also offers water resistance and a surgical-grade stainless steel body. The Space Black color option adds a luxurious and elegant touch to the device's overall design.

descriptions.title: Introducing Dynamic Island
descriptions.details: The Dynamic Island on the iPhone 14 Pro Max is a convenient feature that allows users to easily access and manage important notifications and activities on their devices. It appears on the home screen or in any app when the phone is unlocked and provides a quick overview of things like current music playing, timers, AirDrop connections, and directions from Maps. Users can expand the activity to see more detail by touching and holding it or swiping from the center to the right or left side. They can also collapse the activity to make the Dynamic Island smaller by swiping from the right or left side towards the center. Additionally, users can switch between two activities by swiping from one side or the other. This makes it easy to stay on top of important notifications and activities without having to navigate away from the current app or screen.

descriptions.title: Always-On display
descriptions.details: The iPhone 14 Pro Max display can operate with a refresh rate as low as 1 Hz with a new low-power mode and uses improved technology that allows the display to dim the entire Lock Screen. The display dims when you lock your device or leave it idle. Always-On display also uses multiple coprocessors in the A16 Bionic to refresh the display using minimal power. You can customize your Always-On display by personalizing your Lock Screen with photos, wallpapers with stylized fonts and colors, and widgets. When iPhone is turned face down or in your pocket, it goes dark to save battery life.

descriptions.title: All-new 48MP Main camera with advanced quad-pixel sensor
descriptions.details: The latest iPhone 14 Pro Max from Apple comes with a pro camera system. The main camera is 48MP for up to 4x the resolution, 12MP Telephoto for up to 2x better low-light photos and 12MP Ultra Wide for sharper, brighter macro shots. The quad-pixel sensor on the Main camera makes the most of 48 megapixels by adapting to what youâre shooting. You can also snap your sharpest, most colorful close-ups and group shots, thanks to a new TrueDepth front camera with autofocus and a larger aperture. The TrueDepth camera and A16 Bionic also power Face ID, the most secure facial authentication in a smartphone

descriptions.title: Emergency SOS, Crash Detection
descriptions.details: iPhone 14 Pro Max can detect a severe car crash, then call emergency services and notify your emergency contacts. It can detect Sudden speed shifts, Abrupt changes in direction, Cabin pressure changes, and Loud sound levels of impact and then send an alert to save your life.

descriptions.title: DJI Matrice 300 RTK Commercial Drone
descriptions.details: Matrice 300 RTK is one of the smart and stronger drone of DJI. The drone has some special features like 15 km Max Transmission, 55-min Max Flight Time, 6 Directional Sensing & Positioning, Primary Flight Display, IP45 Rating, -20Â°C to 50Â°C Operating Temperature, Hot-swappable Battery, UAV Health Management System and many more. Checkout the key focused features and details below.

descriptions.title: Improved Transmission System
descriptions.details: DJI Matrice 300 RTK has The all-new OcuSync Enterprise enables transmission up to 15 km away and supports triple-channel3 1080p video. Real-time auto-switching between 2.4 GHz and 5.8 GHz4 enables more reliable flight near high-interference environments, while AES-256 encryption offers secure data transmission.

descriptions.title: Enhanced Flight Performance
descriptions.details: The refined airframe and propulsion system design gives you a more efficient and stable flight, even in harsh conditions.

descriptions.title: Multiple Payload Configurations
descriptions.details: Configure your M300 RTK to fit your mission needs. Mount up to 3 payloads simultaneously, with a maximum payload capacity of 2.7 kg.

descriptions.title: Live Mission Recording
descriptions.details: Record mission actions such as aircraft movement, gimbal orientation, photo shooting, and zoom level to create sample mission files for future automated inspections.

descriptions.title: AI Spot-Check7
descriptions.details: Automate routine inspections and capture consistent results every time. Onboard AI recognizes the subject of interest and identifies it in subsequent automated missions to ensure consistent framing.

descriptions.title: Waypoints 2.
descriptions.details: Create up to 65,535 waypoints and set multiple actions for one or more payloads, including 3rd party ones, at each waypoint. Flightpath planning is also optimized to maximize flexibility and efficiency for your missions.

descriptions.title: PinPoint
descriptions.details: Mark an object in camera or map view with a quick tap, and advanced sensor fusion algorithms will immediately calculate its coordinates, which are projected to all camera views as an AR icon. The location of the subject is automatically shared with another remote controller, or to online platforms such as DJI FlightHub9.

descriptions.title: Smart Track
descriptions.details: Identify and follow moving subjects like people, vehicles, and boats with the Smart Track function, where auto-zoom is applied for steady tracking and viewing. The subjectÃ¢â¬â¢s dynamic location is continuously acquired and shared to another remote controller or to DJI FlightHub9.

descriptions.title: Aviation-Grade Situational Awareness
descriptions.details: The M300 RTK adopts a new Primary Flight Display (PFD) that integrates flight, navigation, and obstacle information to empower the pilot with exceptional situational awareness.

descriptions.title: Advanced Dual Control
descriptions.details: Either operator can now obtain control of the aircraft or payload with a single tap. This creates new possibilities for mission strategies as well as higher flexibility during operations.

descriptions.title: A Powerful Vision System You Can Rely On
descriptions.details: To enhance in-flight safety and aircraft stability, dual-vision and ToF sensors appear on all six sides of the aircraft, offering a maximum detection range of up to 40 m, with options to customize the aircraftÃ¢â¬â¢s sensing behavior via the DJI Pilot App. Even in complex operating environments, this 6 Directional Sensing and Positioning system helps keep the aircraft and the mission safe.

descriptions.title: Professional Maintenance for Your Drone Fleet
descriptions.details: The new integrated Health Management System displays the current status of all systems, notification logs, and a preliminary troubleshooting guide. Also in the system are the aircraftÃ¢â¬â¢s flight logs, duration, and mileage throughout its entire lifecycle, and tips on aircraft care and maintenance.

descriptions.title: DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Drone
descriptions.details: The DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual is ideal for a Business start-up Drone, this versatile quad-copter packs a lot of features that can be utilized across various sectors thanks to an additional set of accessories that are carried over from the DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise. The DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual includes a dual camera that houses two lenses - standard visual (zoom) and FLIR (Forward Looking Infra-Red) - speaker, floodlight, and beacon. The drone itself features the standard DJI Mavic style fold-out arms which provide a quicker setup time and deployment, within minutes if the situation requires. Some examples of sectors that this drone would be used for are; SAR (Search and Rescue), Emergency Services (Police, Fire, Coastguard), Commercial, Private and Industrial Inspections (visual and thermal), Restricted Area Control, Film production, aerial photography and many more.

descriptions.title: Mode Elements
descriptions.details: Some of the features include the advanced obstacle avoidance system reduces the risk of accidental contact with other objects improving the safety of each flight, Data Security, GPS timestamping, DJI AirSense, Ocusync 2.0 to name a few. A great feature that DJI has put some thought into is the inclusion of a Discreet Mode, this allows you to turn off the LEDs when performing a night mission to ensure you are not being obtrusive to anyone during your flight.

descriptions.title: Perfect for Easy transport
descriptions.details: The DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual blazes the trail for Commercial Drone Businesses wanting to access multiple sectors. In the ever-growing drone market, trying to choose the right drone for your business can almost certainly leave you confused, lost and drowning in a mass of information. This drone may be small when compared to others on the market, but don"t let that put you off as this little terrier of the sky has a bite bigger than its bark! Being a smaller drone though does have its advantages: compact and easy to store therefore saving space, easily carried/transported to remote areas without the use of vehicles, fit and access small spaces and tight spots, can be operated from small take-off/landing areas.

descriptions.title: Powerful and Portable thermal Imaging
descriptions.details: Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual Drone features a three-axis gimbal stabilized camera housing a side-by-side 4K sensor for capturing visible light and a FLIR imaging sensor for capturing thermal data. Together these sensors allow pilots to perform flights at night, as well as fly in complex daytime conditions like fog and smoke. Users can select from multiple intelligent display modes in the DJI Pilot flight control app to visualize data from the dual-sensor camera: FLIR MSX - A new feature that combines data from the visual and thermal cameras in real time to enhance visual details, helping pilots quickly identify and interpret critical data that may not be immediately visible to the naked eye. This Drone has features like Spot Meter - Displays the average temperature of an object, helping pilots monitor and measure critical or hazardous objects while maintaining a safe distance. Area Measurement - Displays the average, lowest, and highest temperature, as well as the corresponding locations of each area, allowing inspectors to quickly assess objects and determine if an asset may be overheating. Isotherm - Allows pilots to designate specific temperature ranges to be displayed using a custom color palette so objects within the range relay higher contrast and better visibility. This feature includes custom profiles to aid search and rescue pilots in identifying people and to help firefighters identify hot spots in fires, as well as a custom profile setting for added flexibility.

descriptions.title: Refined Imaging And Enhanced Vision
descriptions.details: The imaging system has been developed with two goals in mind; assisting pilots in close-range missions; and ensuring captured data is more relevant and trusted than ever. DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual Edition Drone is launched with a purpose of enhanced image visibility on all your captured data, Isotherm helps you get accurate heat measurements on a variety of objects and scenarios. You can Visualize scenarios in real time, monitor and measure objects on site more safely and efficiently so you can make the most informed decisions. Enhance image visibility for on-the ground team missions, Enhance image visibility for improved situational awareness and Create predefined isotherm setting.

descriptions.title: Safety Features
descriptions.details: DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual Edition Drone comes with Shield Basic properties that include: User/Pilot Error, Signal Interference, Collision, Water Damage and Drop Damage.

descriptions.title: Emergency response
descriptions.details: The DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual Edition Drone has the ability to go from packed away to in the air in mere minutes during emergency situations, making response times more effective. Using the Mavic 2 Enterprise is a cost-effective alternative to traditional helicopters and can help respond tactically to unexpected missions. Collect the necessary situational data to help minimize unforeseen dangers to crew and their surroundings, allowing for a safer mission.

descriptions.title: DJI Smart Controller
descriptions.details: The Mavic Duals smart controller was built for aircrafts with OcuSync 2.0 and made to enhance your outdoor flying experience with its ultra-bright 5.5-inch 1080p display. Allowing for clear visibility and brighter images even in less than desirable conditions like direct sunlight. It boasts intuitive controls and pre-installed apps like SkyTalk and DJI Go helping you get in the air more quickly than ever before. Third-party apps are also supported, so drone pilots have a complete choice when it comes to operational controls. The smart controller lets you connect to a HDMI port and microSD card slot, and operates at 1000 cd/m2 brightness.

descriptions.title: Standard Remote Controller
descriptions.details: The Mavic dual"s standard remote controller boasts 135 minutes of battery life when fully charged - leaving you plenty of time to capture what you need in the field. It is also built with an ergonomic design that allows for easy storage with its foldable body and detachable sticks. This design works exceptionally well with smartphones and gives an enhanced operational experience to use the DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual Edition Drone.

descriptions.title: DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Drone
descriptions.details: The DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise is a foldable, portable, long-range flying camera and accessory system that adapts well to uses by first responders and businesses that routinely inspect hard-to-reach assets. This affordable quadcopter has a 2x optical and 3x digital camera, allowing a broader view or a close-up look at developing situations or infrastructure. The camera shoots sharp 12 MP stills and vibration-free 4K ultra-high-definition video. It transmits live video over its full 4.97-mile range in 1080p high definition. It stays aloft for up to half an hour. Hover safely over wildfires or urban infernos. Perform search-and-rescue operations over limited-access terrain or bodies of water. Broadcast warnings or directions using the easily mounted loudspeaker. Record at night with Snap-on flood lamps. Observe suspects or track escapees. Get close to cell towers, high-tension lines, bridges and high-rise buildings without compromising worker safety. Examine storm-damaged roofs from the ground.

descriptions.title: Mavic Lens with Zoom
descriptions.details: The Mavic 2 Enterprise camera has an optical zoom lens with two focal lengthsâ24 and 48mm in 35mm equivalent. Zoom capabilities mean personnel get a closer look without taking on added risk. The Mavic 2 Enterprise camera has 2x optical magnification. Give the command through the DJI Go 4 flight program, and the focal length of the lens changes instantly. Bring objects visually closerâideal for police surveillance, fire observation or industrial inspections. The camera also has a 3x digital zoom with minimal loss of sharpness.

descriptions.title: Perfect for Easy transport
descriptions.details: The DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Zoom blazes the trail for Commercial Drone Businesses wanting to access multiple sectors. In the ever-growing drone market, trying to choose the right drone for your business can almost certainly leave you confused, lost and drowning in a mass of information. This drone may be small when compared to others on the market, but don"t let that put you off as this little terrier of the sky has a bite bigger than its bark! Being a smaller drone though does have its advantages: compact and easy to store therefore saving space, easily carried/transported to remote areas without the use of vehicles, fit and access small spaces and tight spots, can be operated from small take-off/landing areas.

descriptions.title: Intelligent Flight Battery
descriptions.details: Each Intelligent Flight Battery can power the DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise for up to a half-hour maximum flight time. Using the included accessories slightly reduces flight time. The batteries self-heat from about 43 degrees Fahrenheit down to 14 F. Heating also can be switched manually with the remote controller. The batteries protect themselves from harmful power levels when stored. Mavic 2 batteries are interchangeable with those of the Mavic 2 Zoom and Mavic 2 Pro. The included Mavic 2 charger and available charging hub will charge the batteries of any Mavic 2 model. A full charge takes about an hour. A hub will charge up to four batteries in sequence, starting with the battery that has the highest reserve, then automatically moving on to the next highest.

descriptions.title: Refined Imaging And Enhanced Vision
descriptions.details: The imaging system has been developed with two goals in mind; assisting pilots in close-range missions; and ensuring captured data is more relevant and trusted than ever. DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Zoom Edition Drone is launched with a purpose of enhanced image visibility on all your captured data, zoom features helps you get accurate measurements on a variety of objects and scenarios. You can Visualize scenarios in real time, monitor and measure objects on site more safely and efficiently so you can make the most informed decisions. descriptions.title: Safety Features
descriptions.details: DJI Mavic 2 Enterprise Zoom Edition Drone comes with Shield Basic properties that include: User/Pilot Error, Signal Interference, Collision, Water Damage and Drop Damage.

descriptions.title: Dynamic Zoom
descriptions.details: The imaging system has been developed with two goals in mind: assisting pilots in close-range missions, and ensuring captured data is more relevant and trusted than ever. Improved FlightAutonomy gives you omnidirectional obstacle sensing, an advanced sensing system comprised of 8 high resolution vision and 2 infrared sensors placed on the sides of the aircraft. These powerful set of sensors work together to determine the relative speed and distance between the aircraft and an object, so you can fly and hover with more stability than ever in a wide range of open and complex environments. Stay close to the action - but away from the danger. The Mavic 2 Enterprise is equipped with a 2x optical, 3x digital zoom camera that lets you operate in close range missions without putting yourself in harm"s way.

descriptions.title: DJI Smart Controller
descriptions.details: The Mavic Zoom's smart controller was built for aircrafts with OcuSync 2.0 and made to enhance your outdoor flying experience with its ultra-bright 5.5-inch 1080p display. Allowing for clear visibility and brighter images even in less than desirable conditions like direct sunlight. It boasts intuitive controls and pre-installed apps like SkyTalk and DJI Go helping you get in the air more quickly than ever before. Third-party apps are also supported, so drone pilots have a complete choice when it comes to operational controls. The smart controller lets you connect to a HDMI port and microSD card slot, and operates at 1000 cd/m2 brightness.

descriptions.title: DJI P4 Multispectral Drone
descriptions.details: The DJI P4 Multispectral Agricultural Drone can be a useful tool in monitoring, understanding, and treating concerns connected to crop and vegetation health with information that is invisible to the human eye. This is true for both environmental research and agriculture. This drone can look below the surface since it has a gimbal with a 6-camera array. The other five cameras each capture a different wavelength, while one camera is an RGB camera that only records visible light and takes conventional images. The other five cameras record 2MP images in wavelengths including red edge, near-infrared, green, red, and blue. Even while flying at higher speeds, the resulting photographs are clear thanks to the global shutter and 3-axis stabilized gimbal. To maximize data collection and concentrate on the regions that require the most attention, you can flip between the two feeds while flying. An integrated spectral sunlight sensor on the top of the P4 Multispectral quadcopter works in conjunction with the gimbal camera to achieve the most accurate NDVI results possible. The sensor captures solar irradiance to help increase accuracy and maintain consistency in processed data through different times of the day.

descriptions.title: RTK Compatible
descriptions.details: The DJI P4 Multispectral Drone includes an RTK module that can be used to help increase the accuracy of GPS location data. The P4 Multispectral is compatible with the optional D-RTK 2 Mobile Station and NTRIP.

descriptions.title: Centimeter-Level Precision
descriptions.details: The DJI P4 Multispectral Drone's real-time, centimeter-accurate data collection in imaging is made possible by DJI's TimeSync system. TimeSync causes the P4 to continuously align the gimbal camera, RTK module, and flight controller, setting the location to the CMOS's center. This helps offer the post-processing software for your photos incredibly precise metadata.

descriptions.title: HP LaserJet Enterprise MFP M528dn Multifunctional Mono Laser Printer
descriptions.details: The HP M528DN Multifunctional LaserJet Enterprise Printer is a business-oriented laser printer with great performance. It provides efficient black printing with a 1200 x 1200 dpi resolution, delivering sharp and clear text. Its duplex printing function allows it to print on both sides of the page instantly, saving time and decreasing paper waste. The printer is suitable with a variety of printing environments since it supports languages such as HP PCL 5, HP PCL 6, HP Postscript Level 3 (Emulation), and Native PDF. It offers a rapid print speed of 45 ppm for black documents and a duplex print speed of 34 ipm. The printer offers a short first print time of 6 seconds for black prints, allowing you to print your papers right away. It can handle high-volume printing demands with a monthly duty cycle of 150,000 pages and a suggested monthly volume of 7,500 pages. The HP M528DN is ideal for office locations where space is limited, with dimensions of 19 x 19.6 x 19.5" (W x H x D) and a weight of 47.18 lb. It combines high-quality printing, scanning, and copying capabilities with advanced functionality and reliability, making it an excellent choice for enterprises with high-volume printing requirements.

descriptions.title: Efficient Printing with Duplex Capability
descriptions.details: The HP M528DN provides bright and sharp black printouts with a print resolution of 1200 x 1200 dpi. Its quick printing speed of 45 ppm (black) allows for quick document generation, increasing job productivity. The printer also offers duplex printing, which allows for automated double-sided printing while conserving paper and money.

descriptions.title: Wide Format Support and Large Paper Capacity
descriptions.details: The HP M528DN has two input trays and one output tray for diverse media handling. It supports a broad range of media sizes, from 2.99 x 5" to a maximum of 8.5 x 14.02", and is capable of handling a wide range of document types. The printer has a large paper capacity, with 100 sheets in Input Tray 1, 550 pages in Input Tray 2, and up to 250 sheets in the output tray. It also accepts unique media, such as envelopes.

descriptions.title: Flatbed Scanner with ADF and High Resolution
descriptions.details: The HP M528DN scans documents efficiently due to its integrated flatbed scanner and automated document feeding (ADF). The scanner has a maximum optical resolution of 600 dpi, which ensures precise and detailed scans. It supports color and grayscale scanning modes, as well as a wide range of file formats such as JPEG, Multi-Page TIFF, PDF, PDF/A, TIFF, and XPS. The copier feature provides for simple duplicating, with choices for up to 9999 copies, duplex copying, and a color document copy quality of 600 x 600 dpi.

descriptions.title: Seamless Connectivity and User-Friendly Interface
descriptions.details: The HP M528DN provides seamless communication through RJ45 and USB-B connectors, making it simple to integrate into network infrastructures. It is compatible with a wide range of common operating systems, including Android, Windows, iOS, and macOS. The printer has an 8-inch touchscreen display with an easy-to-use interface for navigation and control.

descriptions.title: Optimal Operating Conditions and Energy Efficiency
descriptions.details: The temperature range for the HP M528DN is 42 to 65Â°F, with a suggested humidity range of 30 to 70%. It draws 629 W at full load but has energy-saving capabilities that reduce power consumption during standby and sleep modes. During operation, the printer produces a maximum acoustic noise level of 6.8 BA and 54 dBA under pressure.

descriptions.title: Epson EcoTank L15160 A3 Wi-Fi Duplex All-in-One Ink Tank Printer
descriptions.details: The Epson EcoTank L15160 A3 Wi-Fi Duplex All-in-One Ink Tank Printer is the perfect choice for businesses requiring fast and high-volume A3 color printing. This printer is specifically designed to minimize costs associated with duplex printing and scanning, supporting up to A3 size documents. With the utilization of the latest pigment ink technology known as DURABrite ET INK, the printer produces sharp, clear, and long-lasting prints that are resistant to water damage. The compact design of the Epson EcoTank L15160 allows it to easily fit into any office space, taking up minimal room. Epson understands the importance of both quality and cost savings, which is why they pay close attention to even the smallest details when developing their products. Featuring a fast color print speed of up to 25.0 ipm (Simplex), this printer ensures efficient and time-saving printing processes. It can handle prints up to A3+ size for simplex printing, accommodating larger documents and projects. The automatic duplex printing feature enables the printer to print on both sides of the paper automatically, further reducing paper waste and saving valuable resources. With an ultra-high page yield of 7,500 pages for black ink and 6,000 pages for color ink, the Epson EcoTank L15160 ensures a longer period of uninterrupted printing before ink replacement is required. This contributes to improved productivity and reduced operating costs for businesses. The printer offers versatile connectivity options, including Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi Direct, and Ethernet, providing flexibility and convenience in setting up and accessing the printer from multiple devices. The Epson Connect feature allows users to print and scan remotely through various applications such as Epson iPrint, Epson Email Print, and Remote Print Driver. Additionally, the Scan to Cloud functionality enables easy and direct scanning of documents to cloud storage services. The Epson EcoTank L15160 A3 Wi-Fi Duplex All-in-One Ink Tank Printer is a reliable and efficient solution for businesses seeking high-quality A3 color printing. It combines fast printing speeds, duplex functionality, cost-effective ink usage, and versatile connectivity options to meet the demands of modern businesses while ensuring excellent print quality and reduced operating costs.
